section.name: Get Involved
section.p: There are plenty of things you can do to help out with Myrmidon. The Todo list below describes items which still need to be done. Of course, since this is an open-source project, there's plenty of scope for experimentation, and you can pretty much make up your own items to work on.
Some things that are worth reading if you do want to get involved:

ul.li: The Jakarta Project's Get Involved page.

section.p: There is no Ant 2 or Myrmidon mailing list yet, so direct any questions or comments you have to the ant-dev mailing list.
